snippet.title: The Forever Winter - Full Length Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam today - http://tinyurl.com/mr22dujw 
The Forever Winter releases 9/24/24 in early access. Epic made it possible for us to make this game, their engine is an absolute beast and it’s letting small teams knock it out of the park visually.
We also want to share that they provided some much needed fire support and that assistance is allowing us to localize in a ton of languages.
If this video does really well the team can’t wait to do another. Thinking a mother courage life cycle short would be killer! 
Really appreciate the support of the community, we know it’s out of control long but we really wanted to capture the vibe of our world and we could not have done it without our homies at Black Amber, and my bros Erasmus Brosdau and Soheyl Mohammad.
See you soon scavs.
